title: NFL appeals Deshaun Watson suspension; Big leap for Tua? Massive expectations for Bills; Newly retired LB K.J. Wright
itunes:title: NFL appeals Deshaun Watson suspension; Big leap for Tua? Massive expectations for Bills; Newly retired LB K.J. Wright
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with insiders Tom Pelissero and Judy Battista sharing the latest news surrounding Deshaun Watson and the NFL appeal.  Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty share their reaction to the NFL appealing Deshaun Watson’s six game suspension. Next, the GMFB crew discusses on “we in or we out” if Tua Tagovailoa will make a giant leap this year, and then they’re joined by newly retired linebacker K.J. Wright and he shares why he’s still on cloud nine, what led him to walk away from the game, and how Russell Willson will fit with Denver. The podcast finishes up with a live look in at Bills camp and then the hosts wonder if it’s a forgone conclusion that the Bills will be in the AFC Championship.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
